channel.title: Dragonscape 508 botnet
channel.description:
Mods, wasn't sure where to put this.
ANyways there's botnet on the dragonscape 508 clients. I think v2 and v3 are what he put the bot net on, but basically the client downloads a program, err jar i should say, called svchost.exe(because jusched.jar would just be too obvious) and it joins an IRC channel with a random name, and runs on startup
How do I know, well I un knowingly helped him, and he's my cousin, and he lives across the street from me
Just thought I would let you all know. There's about 130+ infected computers right now.

item.title: Dragonscape 508 botnet
